reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2 and 3
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '6c0a955f5f344f9' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 6c0a955f5f344f9 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
STEP 4
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled '6c0a955f5f344f9 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled '6c0a955f5f344f9 dialog'.
STEP 5
Select revision titled '6c0a955f5f344f9'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
STEP 6
Enter '05/02/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '02:15 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
STEP 7
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '6c0a955f5f344f9 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
STEP 8
Switch to the active frame titled '6c0a955f5f344f9 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text '6c0a955f5f344f9' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '05/02/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the 'Run now' link is present for content item '6c0a955f5f344f9' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
Verify the 'Cancel' link is present for content item '6c0a955f5f344f9' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
STEP 9
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Verify the text 'Revision state: Published' is present in the work bench info block.
Verify the text 'Public: Yes' is present in the work bench info block.
STEP 10
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Enter '307d7af91efc427' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post 307d7af91efc427 has been created.' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled '307d7af91efc427 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled '307d7af91efc427 dialog'.
Select revision titled '307d7af91efc427'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '05/02/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '02:21 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled '307d7af91efc427 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Verify there are no errors present.
Switch to the active frame titled '307d7af91efc427 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text '307d7af91efc427' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '05/02/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Run now' link for content item '307d7af91efc427' with action 'Moderate to Published'.
STEP 11
Switch to the active frame titled '307d7af91efc427 dialog'.
Verify the scheduled text '307d7af91efc427' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Moderate to Published' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text '05/02/2014 - ' is present in the scheduled queue.
Verify the scheduled text 'Completed' is present in the scheduled queue.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
